title: Kobold Glider
summaries: The Kobold Glider is a Hardmode enemy that is only found during the Old One's Army event. It attacks by flying overhead and ramming itself at the Eternia Crystal, exploding on impact. It can also ram itself into players.
The Kobold Glider requires 100 kills to be awarded completion of its corresponding <linked>banner</linked>, as opposed to the usual 50 kills.
